Posts.Content: Hi ladies i am a newby and had my letter today confirming my chemo starts next Friday. I hate the unknow of how I will feel and also have a needle phobia! Any advice is very welcome i am having chemo before surgery so have felt 'different' to a lot of comments and advice.  Looking forward to being part of this lovely group during this horrid time x
Posts.Title: *** September Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Thanks ladies.  Pit all feels very surreal still i am having my bloods done on Wednesday then am in for a guided X-ray to have a picc line put in. Hoping it will be better that a cannula twice a week but I reserve judgements evasive part of my phobia is with something in side me not just the needle bit! i am having fec-t so think it's pretty standard.  Aam trying to have a family weekend away atm as I don't know how I will be feeling. My final treatment (all going well) will be on Xmas day
Posts.Title: *** September Chemo Club ***
